user_query: I'm planning a trip to India and I want to stay updated on the latest news and happenings there. Can you provide me with news related to India from the India Today Unofficial platform? Additionally, I am interested in news about AR and VR.

TaskList.description: Fetch the latest news related to India from the India Today Unofficial platform.
Fetch the latest news in the fields of Augmented Reality (AR) and Virtual Reality (VR).
